alert.note: Alert for Mahoning; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 6:46PM EST until March 08 at 8:06AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Mahoning River At Youngstown affecting Mahoning and Trumbull Counties. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Youngstown. * WHEN...From this evening to tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, River inundates lowland near the river. Some basement flooding possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM EST Monday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 445 AM EST.
